select a.id, a.fact_id, a.derived_name, a.derived_des, a.time_period, b.indicators_name as atomicName, c.limited_name as businessLimitedName from tb_derived_indicators a LEFT JOIN tb_atomic_indicators b on a.atomic_id=b.id LEFT JOIN tb_business_limited c on a.business_limited_id=c.id where a.del_flag=1
and a.fact_id= ${query.factId}
